azurerm_iothub_consumer_group.description: Manages a Consumer Group within an IotHub

name.description: The name of this Consumer Group. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

iothub_name.description: The name of the IoT Hub. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

eventhub_endpoint_name.description: The name of the Event Hub-compatible endpoint in the IoT hub. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group that contains the IoT hub. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

id.description: The ID of the IoTHub Consumer Group.

create.description: Used when creating the IotHub Consumer Group.

update.description: Used when updating the IotHub Consumer Group.

read.description: Used when retrieving the IotHub Consumer Group.

delete.description: Used when deleting the IotHub Consumer Group.
